mapper.select: select u_id usersId, u_name usersName from users
mapper.insert: insert into users(u_id, u_email, u_name, u_password, u_reg_date, u_route, u_update_date, u_email_agreement) values(seq_users_id.nextval, #{usersEmail}, #{usersName}, #{usersPassword}, to_date(#{usersRegDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), #{usersRoute}, to_date(#{usersUpdateDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), #{usersEmailAgreement} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from users where u_email = #{email}
